Entries.Mon: $d bus#Hello hello, sweetie! I'm so glad that bus is working again! It's been hard to stay in business.#Hello hello, sweetie! I'm so glad you're willing to make the long trip out here! It's been hard to stay in business.

Entries.Mon2: Hey, sweetie, how's the farm?#$e#Let me guess. You're here to buy a whole bunch of seeds... right, sweetie?$h

Entries.1373001: ItemDelivery/Ghost Berry/The Wizard wants to study a Ghost Berry.
